mapper.sql: t.id, t.org_code, t.inpat_form_no, t.in_diag_code, t.in_diag_name, t.diag_date, t.diag_type_code, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from inpatient_diag where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into inpatient_diag ( org_code, inpat_form_no, in_diag_code, in_diag_name, diag_date, diag_type_code, last_update_dtime ) values( #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDiagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDiagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{diagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update inpatient_diag set org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inpat_form_no = #{inpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_diag_code = #{inDiagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_diag_name = #{inDiagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diag_date = #{diagDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diag_type_code = #{diagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dtime = #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
